db:abstract.db:para: How to use transitions together with MapItemView.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick location
CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += main.cpp
qmlfiles.files = $$files($$PWD/*.qml) qmlfiles.prefix = / qmlfiles.base = $$PWD
RESOURCES += qmlfiles
DISTFILES += $$files($$PWD/*.py) $$files($$PWD/*.GeoJSON) main.qml OsloListModel.qml doc/src/itemview_transitions.qdoc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/location/itemview_transitions INSTALLS += target
